metadata.title: QuickDevTools - Professional Free Developer Tools
metadata.description: Comprehensive toolkit for developers. Format JSON, encode Base64, URL encoding/decoding, timestamp conversion, diff comparison, QR code generation, color picker, regex tester, hash generation, character counter, UUID generation, Markdown preview, and more. All tools run in your browser with local processing for security. Free to use.
metadata.keywords: developer tools, JSON formatter, Base64 encoder, URL encoder, decoder, timestamp converter, UNIX time, diff, QR code generator, color picker, regex tester, hash generator, MD5, SHA-256, character counter, UUID generator, Markdown preview, free tools, online tools

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: A collection of tools to streamline your development workflow. Choose the one that fits your needs.
tools.notFoundDescription: Try changing your search criteria or adjusting the category filters.
tools.newToolsDescription: All tools run in your browser and no data is sent to any server.

format.title: Universal Formatter
format.description: Format and beautify JSON, YAML, SQL, XML, and more.

timestamp.title: UNIX Timestamp Converter
timestamp.description: Convert between UNIX timestamps and human-readable date/time.

urlEncoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
urlEncoder.description: Encode and decode URL strings with ease.

characterCount.title: Character Counter
characterCount.description: Count characters, words, and bytes in your text with detailed analysis.

uuidGenerator.title: UUID Generator
uuidGenerator.description: Easily generate UUID v1, v4, and Nil UUIDs.

markdownPreview.title: Markdown Preview
markdownPreview.description: Preview Markdown in real-time. Supports GitHub Flavored Markdown and HTML export.

characterCountTool.title: Character Counter
characterCountTool.description: Count characters, words, and bytes in your text with detailed analysis.
characterCountTool.featureJapanese: • Separate counting of Japanese characters (Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji)
characterCountTool.featureBytes: • Byte count and reading time calculation
characterCountTool.placeholder: Enter or paste the text you want to count here...
characterCountTool.usageInfo1: • Text is automatically counted in real-time as you type
characterCountTool.usageInfo2: • Separate counting of Japanese (Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji) and alphanumeric characters
characterCountTool.usageInfo3: • Byte count calculation helps estimate data capacity
characterCountTool.usageInfo4: • Reading time estimation feature shows how long it takes to read the text
characterCountTool.usageInfo5: • Copy statistics to clipboard for use in reports
characterCountTool.usageInfo6: • Useful for checking character limits when writing code or documents

formatTool.title: Universal Formatter
formatTool.description: Format and beautify JSON, YAML, SQL, XML, and more.
formatTool.detectionFailed: Could not detect format type, but basic formatting was applied
formatTool.usageInfo1: • Paste the code you want to format into the input field
formatTool.usageInfo2: • Automatically detects and formats JSON, YAML, SQL, XML, CSS, and HTML
formatTool.usageInfo3: • You can try the formatting feature using sample data
formatTool.usageInfo4: • Ctrl + Enter: Shortcut to execute formatting
formatTool.usageInfo5: • Ctrl + Z: Shortcut to undo input
formatTool.usageInfo6: • Formatted results can be copied or saved as a file
formatTool.indentSettingsDesc: Indent size can be adjusted from 1 to 8 spaces. You can choose spaces or tabs to match your project's coding standards. Generally, 2 or 4 space indents are recommended.

uuidGeneratorTool.title: UUID Generator
uuidGeneratorTool.description: Easily generate UUID v1, v4, and Nil UUIDs.
uuidGeneratorTool.clickToGenerate: Click the button above to generate UUIDs
uuidGeneratorTool.v4Description: Randomly generated UUID. Most commonly used.
uuidGeneratorTool.v1Description: Timestamp-based UUID. Can be sorted chronologically.
uuidGeneratorTool.uuidInfo1: UUID is a 128-bit identifier that generates virtually unique values
uuidGeneratorTool.uuidInfo2: Used for database primary keys, session IDs, etc.
uuidGeneratorTool.uuidInfo3: v4 is generated using cryptographically secure random numbers
uuidGeneratorTool.uuidInfo4: v1 is generated from timestamp and node information

contact.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

contact.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the form?
